rules_text:
Choose one –
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value 3 or less.
• You gain 3 life. Draw a card.
rules_text2:
Legacy [i](You may play this side of this card only from your graveyard. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, you may search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
